metadata.title: CVE-2019-3810 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - low
metadata.description: A flaw was found in moodle versions 3.6 to 3.6.1, 3.5 to 3.5.3, 3.4 to3.4.6, 3.1 to 3.1.15 and earlier unsupported versions. The /userpix/ pagedid not escape users' full names, which are included as text when hoveringover profile images. Note this page is not linked to by default and itsaccess is restricted.

criterions.comment: moodle package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
